page.title: 12The Bungalow Filling Station
page.content: The filling station is at Coton on the Whitchurch/Wem Road,it sells petrol and diesel,and repairs cars.The premises were bought by Mr C.K.Morris in 1962 and at that time consisted of 1 small house,2pumps and 1 shop.In 1962 it sold 500 gallons a week at 19 shillings and 6 pence for 4 gallons(approx. 25p per gallon)The premises have been rebuilt with repair facilities and sell 3/5000 gallons a week at Â£2:03 a gallon for 4 star ,3 star 2p less,2 star 4p less.Being the only garage in the area it is popular with the local inhabitants backed by a busy passing trade.
